snippet: Britain's government sought to bolster London's position as a centre for Islamic finance on Tuesday by extending its 'Help to Buy' mortgage scheme to loans that comply with Islamic law....

headline.print_headline: UK Extends Mortgage Aid Scheme to Islamic Finance
headline.main: UK Extends Mortgage Aid Scheme to Islamic Finance

lead_paragraph: Britain's government sought to bolster London's position as a centre for Islamic finance on Tuesday by extending its 'Help to Buy' mortgage scheme to loans that comply with Islamic law.
